name: Monitor Maze
description:
Your job is to hack your way into a high-security, high-surveillance, state-of-the-art computer system. But how do you do that?? You must gather all keys and then reach the exit in one piece while avoiding the anti-viruses that want to kick you out!

You can swap the positions of any two monitors to change the layout of the maze. Adjacent monitors will join together and allow you to move freely between them, provided their layouts line up. No pesky firewalls or mainframes can stop you!

CONTROLS:
WASD - Move
Arrow Keys - Move while strafing (It's not a bug, it's a feature?)
Space - Attack enemies
Click on monitors to swap their positions

Made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2021

Music and sound by lacklustrr: https://lacklustrr.itch.io/
